item.description:
Let's start with dinner before the movie. I'm thinking John Harvard's unless anyone has a better suggestion. We'll meet for dinner at 6:00 and follow it up with the 8:10 showing.

If you can't make dinner, just meet us at the movie.

About the movie: This is the next installment of the Indiana Jones series that dates back to the late 80's.

Indiana Jones (Harrison Ford) races the Soviets -- led by agent Irina Spalko (Cate Blanchett) -- to a lost city called Akakor in the Peruvian forest, in pursuit of a mystical crystal skull. Along for the adventure are old flame Marion Ravenwood (Karen Allen), long-time friend and competitor Mac (Ray Winstone) and new sidekick Mutt Williams (Shia LeBeouf).


Critic Reviews

"...the wonder of Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull is that it avoids being an anticlimax and is entertaining in its own right. "
Los Angeles Times

- Kenneth Turan
"...overall, it's pleasantly nostalgic to see Harrison Ford as Jones again."
USA Today

- Claudia Puig
"...begins with an actual big bang, then gradually slides toward a ho-hum midsection before literally taking off for an uplifting finish. "
Variety

- Todd McCarthy


http://www.indianajon...
item.how_to_find_us:
We'll meet at 6:00 at John Harvard's. John Harvards - 1487 Pleasant Valley Road - Manchester
For those only going to the movie, we'll plan on the 8:10 showing. Look for us in the lobby.
item.name: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull - Dinner and a Movie
